report_title: KJET Garissa County Application Ranking and Evaluation

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: Cooperative, Registered since 2017 (>3 yrs), established governance.

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Consistent sales to schools, retailers; multi-product advantage (Rice/Oil).

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Clear plan for upgrading rice hulling and oil press; quantified targets.

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Priority VCs (Rice/Edible Oils), critical processing/value addition node.

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Youth-led (75% youth), solar power use, waste utilization.

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: Cooperative, Registered since 2018 (>3 yrs), established governance.

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Active offtake contracts (schools/hospitals), multi-channel sales (retail, bulk).

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Clear plan for pasteurization unit and packaging line; quantified targets.

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Priority VC (Dairy), critical processing/value addition node; strong farmer linkages.

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Woman-owned (70% ownership), solar energy, water harvesting, feed resilience.

applications.applicant_name: Dadaab Mercy Savings And Credit Cooperative Society Limited

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: Cooperative, Registered since 2017 (>3 yrs), established governance.

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Consistent sales to NGOs, local businesses (B2B 30%) and B2C.

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Strong plan for scaling textile production and machinery; detailed execution plan.

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Priority VC (Textiles), critical manufacturing/value addition node.

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Woman-owned (51% ownership), water-saving practices, local sourcing.

applications.reason: No verifiable financial evidence (bank/M-Pesa/income statement) was found in the application bundle.
The core business is livestock trade (100% turnover), which is not a KJET Priority or Additional value chain.
The core business (Livestock Keeping 40%, Horticulture 35%) does not align with a KJET Priority or Additional value chain.

applications.applicant_name: Bura Livestock Producers Co-operative Society Limited - Bura Agro-Livestock Producers Cluster
applications.reason: The core business (Livestock 60%) is not a KJET Priority or Additional value chain. Although Rice (40%) is a priority VC, it is not the dominant activity.
